Frontend

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Frontend.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that controls everything what is on the Game.fxml scene.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yan Yan Ji, Lauren Bagnall, Hubert Rzeminski

      • getPosOfGridPane

        private int getPosOfGridPane(int orgWidth,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Find the index of a tile on the board.
        Parameters:
        orgWidth - Width of the board.
        width - Index of the column of the floor tile.
        height - Index of the row of the floor tile.
        Returns:
        Index that is used to find the tile on the board.

        row - Index of the row.
        Returns:
